--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hardware:	

	camera pin:
		三个电压：iovdd, dvdd(vddcamecore), avdd
		reset
		CAM_CLK
		mipi clk 和data
		i2c  clk 和 data
		power_down (camera 使能)
		

	hardware module and flow:
